column3: Who goes there? Are you the one who broke the seal?
Ah, so much time lost... So much frolicking and feasting left undone...
We must make up for it, we must... Beginning by playing with <Emphasis>you</Emphasis>!
Are you so determined to die? One last chance, villains: bow down and acknowledge your king. Your god!
Show me your “vaunted” strength. And I shall expose the lie of your fragmented existence!
You...you have no power over me!
